Achievements.Title: A Concrete Example
Achievements.Description: Build 5000 Foundations.

Achievements.Title: Spaghetti master
Achievements.Description: Build 5 km of Conveyor Belts.

Achievements.Title: Bigger. Better. FICSIT.
Achievements.Description: Build your first Manufacturer.

Achievements.Title: Commencing Project Assembly
Achievements.Description: Build the Space Elevator.

Achievements.Title: ...Satisfactory brought it back
Achievements.Description: Complete all MAM research trees.

Achievements.Title: Curiosity killed the cat...
Achievements.Description: Complete a MAM research tree.

Achievements.Title: Mediocre pioneering
Achievements.Description: Complete Phase 1 of the Space Elevator.

Achievements.Title: Adequate pioneering
Achievements.Description: Complete Phase 2 of the Space Elevator.

Achievements.Title: Pretty good pioneering
Achievements.Description: Complete Phase 3 of the Space Elevator.

Achievements.Title: Efficient pioneering
Achievements.Description: Complete Phase 4 of the Space Elevator.

Achievements.Title: Saved the Day, probably
Achievements.Description: Complete Phase 5 of the Space Elevator and finish the game.

Achievements.Title: Do you want a medal?
Achievements.Description: Complete the Onboarding process.

Achievements.Title: Heal this, nature!
Achievements.Description: Destroy 1000 foliage.

Achievements.Title: Are you sure that's coffee?
Achievements.Description: Drink coffee.

Achievements.Title: No refunds
Achievements.Description: Drive the Cyber Wagon.

Achievements.Title: The floor is lava
Achievements.Description: Avoid touching the ground for 30 minutes.

Achievements.Title: New fear unlocked
Achievements.Description: Fix blown fuse.

Achievements.Title: Caught them all
Achievements.Description: Gather all three Power Slug types.

Achievements.Title: Data driven
Achievements.Description: Gather 100 Hard Drives from Crash Sites.

Achievements.Title: Wheeeee!
Achievements.Description: Bounce on a Space Giraffe Tick Penguin Thing.

Achievements.Title: Establish dominance
Achievements.Description: Hit a creature with a vehicle.

Achievements.Title: Look both ways next time
Achievements.Description: Get knocked over by a vehicle.

Achievements.Title: Wait, you can pet it?
Achievements.Description: Pet the flying Manta.

Achievements.Title: Thank you for the music
Achievements.Description: Find and gather a Boombox tape in the world.

Achievements.Title: Varied diet
Achievements.Description: Gather all three types of edible flora.

Achievements.Title: I'm sure these play a Critical Role
Achievements.Description: Gather a Mercer Sphere.

Achievements.Title: Oddly familiar
Achievements.Description: Gather a Somersloop.

Achievements.Title: Yoink!
Achievements.Description: Gather a Power Slug.

Achievements.Title: Consume
Achievements.Description: Gather 150 Mercer Spheres.

Achievements.Title: My skin feels itchy all of a sudden...
Achievements.Description: Gather 50 Somersloops.

Achievements.Title: Pipe dream
Achievements.Description: Build 5 km of Pipelines.

Achievements.Title: Rock and stone!
Achievements.Description: Place down a Portable Miner.

Achievements.Title: Now where to spend it...
Achievements.Description: Print out your first Coupon.

Achievements.Title: Do you need that?
Achievements.Description: Buy the Golden Nut Statue from the AWESOME Shop.

Achievements.Title: Railroad tycoon
Achievements.Description: Build 5 km of Railway.

Achievements.Title: What a thrill
Achievements.Description: Reach the maximum world height.

Achievements.Title: Peak gameplay
Achievements.Description: Reach the highest cliff in the world.

Achievements.Title: All aboard!
Achievements.Description: Set up a train schedule.

Achievements.Title: That was a close one
Achievements.Description: Survive a fall on 1 health point.

Achievements.Title: Pioneer's best friend
Achievements.Description: Tame a Lizard Doggo.

Achievements.Title: Too fast, Too factory
Achievements.Description: Move faster than 140 km/h.

Achievements.Title: Efficiency first
Achievements.Description: Unlock all Milestones.

Achievements.Title: Master Chef
Achievements.Description: Unlock your first alternate recipe.

Achievements.Title: Let's see what's out there
Achievements.Description: Visit each starting area biome once.

Achievements.Title: Know any campfire songs?
Achievements.Description: Consume at least 40 wood by burning it.

Achievements.Title: Don't underestimate Plant Fuel
Achievements.Description: Consume at least 100 Plant Fuel by burning it.

Achievements.Title: Nice Surprise 1
Achievements.Description: Obtain at least 100 Titanium Ore by collecting Stone.

Achievements.Title: Nice Surprise 2
Achievements.Description: Obtain at least 100 Silicon Ore by collecting Stone.

Achievements.Title: Nice Surprise 3
Achievements.Description: Obtain at least 100 Organic Crystals by collecting plants.

Achievements.Title: Nice Surprise 4
Achievements.Description: Obtain at least 100 Sulfuric Acid by collecting plants.

Achievements.Title: Nice Surprise 5
Achievements.Description: Obtain at least 10 Carbon Nanotubes by collecting plants.

Achievements.Title: Chemist
Achievements.Description: Make 20 Organic Crystals by hand using the original formula.

Achievements.Title: Blackbox designer
Achievements.Description: Copy and save a Blueprint.

Achievements.Title: I'm gonna need more drones!
Achievements.Description: Control 10 or more Construction Drones.

Achievements.Title: Sail away with me
Achievements.Description: Unlock upgrade to make the Solar Sail last 2 hours.

Achievements.Title: Who approved this?
Achievements.Description: Unlock technology to make the construction latitude of the Dyson Sphere node reach 45 degrees.

Achievements.Title: Light-footed
Achievements.Description: Unlock upgrade to make mecha reach 12m/s movement speed.

Achievements.Title: Employee of the month
Achievements.Description: Unlock upgrade to allow Pile Sorters to load and unload cargos simultaneously.

Achievements.Title: Magpie
Achievements.Description: Discover 7 kinds of rare minerals, and collect at least 10 by hand.

Achievements.Title: Space invaders
Achievements.Description: Use the mineral burial function to bury at least 20 Veins.

Achievements.Title: Mineral field depleted
Achievements.Description: Deplete 1 Vein.

Achievements.Title: Minerals by the dozen
Achievements.Description: Cover at least 12 Veins with one Mining machine.

Achievements.Title: Slip 'n' slide
Achievements.Description: Fill 10 tanks of fluid in a game.

Achievements.Title: Now Boarding
Achievements.Description: Have at least 100 Logistics Drones for a planet in transit.

Achievements.Title: Interstellar convoy
Achievements.Description: Have at least 50 Interstellar Logistics Vessels in space.

Achievements.Title: Forgot about that
Achievements.Description: Build Wind Turbines on a planet with no atmosphere.

Achievements.Title: High-rise
Achievements.Description: Build a building at least 7 stories tall.

Achievements.Title: Determination
Achievements.Description: Use more than 80K foundations on a Waterworld planet.

Achievements.Title: Don't sand so close to me
Achievements.Description: Collect at least 4M units of sand in a game.

Achievements.Title: I saw this in a movie once
Achievements.Description: Cover a planet with a Foundation.

Achievements.Title: Tickets please!
Achievements.Description: Establish an Interstellar Logistics Transportation line.

Achievements.Title: Intergalactic logistics
Achievements.Description: Establish 5 Interstellar Logistics Transportation lines between different planetary systems.

Achievements.Title: Low battery
Achievements.Description: Have Icarus’ energy below 5% for more than 3 minutes when on the ground.

Achievements.Title: Space junk
Achievements.Description: Exhaust both fuel and energy while flying in space.

Achievements.Title: Running on fumes
Achievements.Description: Manually collect 20 Hydrogen with Icarus on a Gas Giant while energy is at 5% or less.

Achievements.Title: No diving!
Achievements.Description: Have a mecha run out of energy and fall into water.

Achievements.Title: Power surge
Achievements.Description: Use 12 Wireless Power Towers to charge a mecha at the same time.

Achievements.Title: Burn baby burn
Achievements.Description: Have Icarus burn at least 16 different fuels in a game.

Achievements.Title: I can see my house from here!
Achievements.Description: Get Icarus 40m above sea level without entering flight mode.

Achievements.Title: Sonic boom!
Achievements.Description: Exceed a sailing speed of 340m/s in the atmosphere.

Achievements.Title: Faster than light
Achievements.Description: Reach a sailing speed of 3000m/s in non-warp transportation.

Achievements.Title: My planet, my rules!
Achievements.Description: Name a planet.

Achievements.Title: One giant leap for mankind!
Achievements.Description: Leave the original planet and land on another within an hour.

Achievements.Title: Where no coal has gone before
Achievements.Description: Use coal as the only fuel to move from one planet to another.

Achievements.Title: Only impossible until it's not
Achievements.Description: Start warp engine.

Achievements.Title: Before our time
Achievements.Description: Land on another planet outside the initial planetary system before unlocking Warp drive.

Achievements.Title: Planet Explorer I
Achievements.Description: Land on 5 different planets!

Achievements.Title: Planet Explorer II
Achievements.Description: Land on 15 different planets!

Achievements.Title: What time is it?
Achievements.Description: Find and land on a planet with day and night tidal locking.

Achievements.Title: I'm not tilted
Achievements.Description: Find and land on a planet rotating on a horizontal axis.

Achievements.Title: The sun rises in the...West?
Achievements.Description: Find and land on a planet rotating on a reverse axis.

Achievements.Title: Are you proud of me, Stephen?
Achievements.Description: Find and orbit a Black Hole.

Achievements.Title: Boy genius
Achievements.Description: Find and orbit a Neutron Star.

Achievements.Title: Bon voyage!
Achievements.Description: Travel to the planetary system farthest from your original system.

Achievements.Title: Well traveled
Achievements.Description: Travel to at least 32 planetary systems in a game.

Achievements.Title: Let there be light!
Achievements.Description: Light an Artificial Star on the North and South Pole of the original planet, an Ice Field Gelisol Planet, and the eternal night side of a tide-locked planet.

Achievements.Title: Lean mean cleaning machine
Achievements.Description: Use Icarus' garbage clearing function to absorb 50,000 units of Iron Ingot at the same time.

Achievements.Title: Environmental nightmare
Achievements.Description: Drop 3000 units of Titanium Ingot at once while flying through space.

Achievements.Title: Build it and they will come
Achievements.Description: Build 10 Orbital Collectors.

Achievements.Title: Maximum efficiency
Achievements.Description: Build and maintain 100 Ray Receivers with a receiving efficiency of over 85%.

Achievements.Title: Data rules everything around me
Achievements.Description: Achieve a Matrix Lab upload rate of 1M hash/s.

Achievements.Title: Firing on all cylinders
Achievements.Description: Unlock upgrade to decrease the mineral mining consumption rate to less than 15%.

Achievements.Title: Memento!
Achievements.Description: Don't dismantle the landing capsule before completing the game.

Achievements.Title: Icarus, PhD
Achievements.Description: Unlock all technologies (upgrade Unlimited Technology at least once).

Achievements.Title: Mission accomplished
Achievements.Description: Complete the game.

Achievements.Title: x0.5 Resource completion
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on x0.5 resource difficulty.

Achievements.Title: Didn't break a sweat!
Achievements.Description: Complete the game within 25 hours on x1 (or less) resource difficulty.

Achievements.Title: Mission impossible!
Achievements.Description: Complete the game within 10 hours on x1 (or less) resource difficulty.

Achievements.Title: Solar Sail? No thank you!
Achievements.Description: Complete the game without launching a Solar Sail.

Achievements.Title: Environmentalist
Achievements.Description: Complete the game without using Foundations.

Achievements.Title: Alien Mineral Protection Act
Achievements.Description: Complete the game without gathering rare veins to obtain rare ores.

Achievements.Title: Bullseye
Achievements.Description: Launch a total of 100K Solar Sails.

Achievements.Title: We have lift-off
Achievements.Description: Launch a total of 30,000 Small Carrier Rockets.

Achievements.Title: Critical thinker
Achievements.Description: Produce a total of 60,000 Critical Photons.

Achievements.Title: Secrets of the universe I
Achievements.Description: Upload a total of 1M Universe matrices.

Achievements.Title: Secrets of the universe II
Achievements.Description: Upload a total of 10M Universe matrices.

Achievements.Title: Got Deuterium?
Achievements.Description: Use Fractionators to produce at least 100K Deuterium per hour on a single planet.

Achievements.Title: Green power
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 43,200 Electromagnetic turbines per hour.

Achievements.Title: Electromagnetic matrix
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 43,200 Electromagnetic matrices per hour.

Achievements.Title: Energy matrix
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 43,200 Energy matrices per hour.

Achievements.Title: Structure matrix
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 43,200 Structure matrices per hour.

Achievements.Title: Information matrix
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 43,200 Information matrices per hour.

Achievements.Title: Gravity matrix
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 43,200 Gravity matrices per hour.

Achievements.Title: Universe matrix, Yellow Belt
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 21,600 Universe matrices per hour.

Achievements.Title: Universe matrix, Green Belt
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 43,200 Universe matrices per hour.

Achievements.Title: Universe matrix, Blue Belt
Achievements.Description: Produce at least 108,000 Universe matrices per hour.

Achievements.Title: No coal? No problem!
Achievements.Description: Generate more than 60MW of electricity on a planet using Wind Turbines.

Achievements.Title: Sunbather
Achievements.Description: Generate more than 180MW of electricity on a planet using Solar Panels.

Achievements.Title: All systems are go!
Achievements.Description: Achieve discharge power of more than 300MW on a planet using Energy Hubs.

Achievements.Title: Going nuclear
Achievements.Description: Generate more than 600MW of power on a planet using Mini Fusion Power Plants.

Achievements.Title: Like a diamond in the sky
Achievements.Description: Light a star that belongs to you in the Milky Way View.

Achievements.Title: CentreBrain needs more energy I
Achievements.Description: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 200MW.

Achievements.Title: CentreBrain needs more energy II
Achievements.Description: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 1GW.

Achievements.Title: CentreBrain needs more energy III
Achievements.Description: Total power generation of the Dyson Sphere reaches 1TW.

Achievements.Title: We can make it if we try
Achievements.Description: Build a Dyson Sphere around a Red Giant star with a power generation performance of more than 10GW.

Achievements.Title: Backup plan
Achievements.Description: Build a Star Cluster with an energy storage capacity of 27GJ or more.

Achievements.Title: Small factory
Achievements.Description: Reach a total power generation of 20MW.

Achievements.Title: Medium factory
Achievements.Description: Reach a total power generation of 100MW.

Achievements.Title: Large factory
Achievements.Description: Reach a total power generation of 1GW.

Achievements.Title: Giant factory
Achievements.Description: Reach a total power generation of 5GW.

Achievements.Title: Universe factory
Achievements.Description: Reach a total power generation of 50GW.

Achievements.Title: Infinite Factory I
Achievements.Description: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1GJ.

Achievements.Title: Infinite Factory II
Achievements.Description: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1TJ.

Achievements.Title: Infinite Factory III
Achievements.Description: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1PJ.

Achievements.Title: Dust to dust I
Achievements.Description: Collect 1M soil piles from Dark Fog.

Achievements.Title: Dust to dust II
Achievements.Description: Collect 10M soil piles from Dark Fog.

Achievements.Title: Dust to dust III
Achievements.Description: Collect 100M soil piles from Dark Fog.

Achievements.Title: Happy Hunting I
Achievements.Description: Neutralize 100 Dark Fog space units.

Achievements.Title: Happy Hunting II
Achievements.Description: Neutralize 1000 Dark Fog space units.

Achievements.Title: Happy Hunting III
Achievements.Description: Neutralize 10000 Dark Fog space units.

Achievements.Title: Bullet Storm
Achievements.Description: Bullet consumption reaches 360/min on any planet.

Achievements.Title: A Penny Saved
Achievements.Description: Complete the mission without any buildings destroyed at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

Achievements.Title: Strangle in the cradle
Achievements.Description: Wipe out a Dark Fog Planetary Base within 1 hour at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

Achievements.Title: Peace & Love
Achievements.Description: Complete the mission without any Dark Fog buildings neutralized at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

Achievements.Title: In the Spotlight
Achievements.Description: Have 40 Laser Towers shoot the same target at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

Achievements.Title: War has Changed
Achievements.Description: Complete the mission without building any Turrets at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

Achievements.Title: Won't Lie Low
Achievements.Description: Attract an attack from a space unit within 1 hour at Difficulty 1.0 or above.

Achievements.Title: Monster Kill
Achievements.Description: Icarus neutralizes over 1,000 Dark Fog units within 1 minute.

Achievements.Title: POPCORN!
Achievements.Description: Implosion Cannon neutralizes 40 enemies or more with 1 shot.

Achievements.Title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Achievements.Description: Keep Icarus' energy shield's power consumption at 1GW while resisting damage for over 1 minute.

Achievements.Title: Invincible
Achievements.Description: Base radius of Icarus' Energy Shield reaches 25m.

Achievements.Title: A.T Field
Achievements.Description: Planetary Shield's coverage reaches 100% over a planet.

Achievements.Title: Super Nova!
Achievements.Description: Activate Supernova.

Achievements.Title: Shoot Oneself in the Foot
Achievements.Description: Lure Lancers to destroy a Planetary Base.

Achievements.Title: You Started It
Achievements.Description: Have Icarus destroyed by Dark Fog at Passive Dark Fog aggressiveness.

Achievements.Title: Right Under My Nose
Achievements.Description: Land on a planet that is 8000m or closer to a Dark Fog Hive.

Achievements.Title: You Shall Not Pass!
Achievements.Description: Neutralize a Relay Station before it lands on a planet.

Achievements.Title: Global Offense
Achievements.Description: Be simultaneously assaulted by 12 Planetary Bases on a planet.

Achievements.Title: Wrong Place
Achievements.Description: Land on a planet occupied by over 20 Planetary Bases.

Achievements.Title: Gotcha
Achievements.Description: Find Dark Fog Communicator.

Achievements.Title: It's on Fire
Achievements.Description: Icarus' Replicator speed reaches 400%.

Achievements.Title: All Calculated
Achievements.Description: Unlock all secret technologies.

Achievements.Title: Crayon Box
Achievements.Description: Build and fly ship with more than 20 colors.

Achievements.Title: Declare War
Achievements.Description: Declare war with different faction.

Achievements.Title: I've Got Present For You
Achievements.Description: Detonate a warhead that kills you and another player.

Achievements.Title: Lock And Load
Achievements.Description: Kill an enemy with a rifle.

Achievements.Title: Monolith
Achievements.Description: Get within 5 meter radius of the monolith in Survival. *Monoliths have to be in the world on loading time

Achievements.Title: Number 5 Is Alive
Achievements.Description: Connect your suit to power with less than 1% power remaining in Survival.

Achievements.Title: Personality Crisis
Achievements.Description: Change astronaut style (color or skin) 20 times in 10 minutes.

Achievements.Title: Smile And Wave
Achievements.Description: Wave to an enemy that is also waving back within 5 meters looking at you in Survival.

Achievements.Title: Win-Win
Achievements.Description: Make peace with a faction.

Achievements.Title: Death Wish
Achievements.Description: Armageddon Mode for 5 hours in Survival.

Achievements.Title: Explorer
Achievements.Description: Visit all planets and moons in Survival mode.

Achievements.Title: Giant Leap For Humankind
Achievements.Description: Walk 1969 meters on a Moon.

Achievements.Title: Going Green
Achievements.Description: Build 25 Solar Panels while playing in Survival Mode.

Achievements.Title: Lost In Space
Achievements.Description: Spend more than 1 hour out of sight of other players on a MP server.

Achievements.Title: Master Engineer
Achievements.Description: 150+ hours.

Achievements.Title: The Bigger They Are
Achievements.Description: Build more than 1,000,000 Kg of cubes.

Achievements.Title: The Harder They Fall
Achievements.Description: Destroy more than 1,000,000 Kg of cubes.

Achievements.Title: The Story Begins
Achievements.Description: Finish the First Jump scenario.

Achievements.Title: Promoted Engineer
Achievements.Description: Complete the final objective of Learning to Survive scenario.

Achievements.Title: Engineering Degree
Achievements.Description: Finish all tasks of Learning to Survive scenario.

Achievements.Title: Planetesphobia
Achievements.Description: Disable the pirate facility without entering the atmosphere in Learning to Survive scenario.

Achievements.Title: It Takes But One
Achievements.Description: Complete all objectives without dying in Learning to Survive scenario.

Achievements.Title: I See Dead Drones
Achievements.Description: Survive 10 waves of drones in Never Surrender scenario.

Achievements.Title: Bring It On
Achievements.Description: Survive 30 waves of drones in Never Surrender scenario.

Achievements.Title: I'm Doing My Part
Achievements.Description: Survive 100 waves of drones in Never Surrender scenario.

Achievements.Title: Scrap Delivery
Achievements.Description: Destroy 1000 pirate drones in Never Surrender scenario.

Achievements.Title: Joint Operation
Achievements.Description: Survive 10 waves with at least 1 other player in Never Surrender scenario.

Achievements.Title: Millionaire Club
Achievements.Description: Get 1,000,000 Space Credits and join the club of the wealthiest people in the galaxy.

Achievements.Title: The friend of the factions
Achievements.Description: Befriend 3 factions; earning trust always pays well in the future.

Achievements.Title: Playing it cool
Achievements.Description: Complete the Frostbite scenario

Achievements.Title: I Am a GPS
Achievements.Description: Discover more than 60% of the map

Achievements.Title: Pathfinder
Achievements.Description: Discover 100% of the map

Achievements.Title: Choo-Choo
Achievements.Description: Use the train to cross the channel

Achievements.Title: Sardine
Achievements.Description: Utilize a boat

Achievements.Title: Head Hunter
Achievements.Description: Discover all recruitment agencies

Achievements.Title: Successfully Docked
Achievements.Description: Use all ports in the game (counts sea and train ports)

Achievements.Title: From the Comfort of Your Home
Achievements.Description: Buy a truck online

Achievements.Title: My Precious
Achievements.Description: Design and apply to your truck a custom multi-color metallic paint

Achievements.Title: Test Drive Limited
Achievements.Description: Drive at least 999 km during jobs with each truck brand featured in the game. Only your owned trucks are counted. (MAN, DAF, Mercedes-Benz, Renault, Iveco, Scania, Volvo)

Achievements.Title: Just in Time!
Achievements.Description: Take an urgent delivery for a minimum of 550 km and complete it with less than 30 minutes remaining

Achievements.Title: Long Hauler
Achievements.Description: Complete a delivery that was greater than 2,000 km

Achievements.Title: Reliable Contractor
Achievements.Description: Perform jobs for at least 15 different companies in the game

Achievements.Title: Profit Hunter
Achievements.Description: Complete a job worth over €130,000 and minimum 2,200 km

Achievements.Title: Experience Beats All!
Achievements.Description: Complete deliveries with all trailer types (Machinery, ADR cargo, Container, Refrigerated, Liquid cargo, Fragile cargo, Construction, Bulk cargo)

Achievements.Title: Job Is Only Worth It If It's Done Well!
Achievements.Description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) for a job that is at least 1,000 km

Achievements.Title: Careerist
Achievements.Description: Complete 5 jobs in a row - in-time, without taking any damage to cargo and without using autoparking

Achievements.Title: Friends Are Always Here to Help You
Achievements.Description: Use automatic parking

Achievements.Title: All Is Possible
Achievements.Description: Take and complete jobs with at least 30 different cargo

Achievements.Title: Minimaxer
Achievements.Description: Gain 20,000 XP for several consecutive jobs with the total distance below 10,000 km

Achievements.Title: Honey, I'm Home
Achievements.Description: Use quick travel to return to your headquarters

Achievements.Title: National Company
Achievements.Description: Own a garage in every city in your headquarter country

Achievements.Title: Property Magnate
Achievements.Description: Own a garage in every city

Achievements.Title: Working with the Elite
Achievements.Description: Achieve 100% of productivity for at least 5 large garages at the same time

Achievements.Title: Swimming in Success
Achievements.Description: Reach an average daily profit of €450,000

Achievements.Title: Performance Optimizer
Achievements.Description: Achieve at least 75% of the average garage productivity for 10 large garages in your company.

Achievements.Title: Aspects of Professionalism
Achievements.Description: Have at least 10 female and 10 male employees of maximum level in your company

Achievements.Title: Zzzzz
Achievements.Description: Use a rest stop

Achievements.Title: Diesel, No Petrol!
Achievements.Description: Use a filling station

Achievements.Title: Volvo Trucks Lover
Achievements.Description: Deliver truck cargo from Volvo Trucks factory (requires Scandinavia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Scania Trucks Lover
Achievements.Description: Deliver truck cargo from Scania factory (requires Scandinavia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Sailor
Achievements.Description: Deliver yachts to all Scandinavian marinas (requires Scandinavia and High Power Cargo Pack DLCs)

Achievements.Title: Whatever Floats Your Boat
Achievements.Description: Deliver cargo to all container ports in Scandinavia (requires Scandinavia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Cattle Drive
Achievements.Description: Complete a livestock delivery to Scandinavia (requires Scandinavia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Sightseer
Achievements.Description: Discover all Scandinavian cities (requires Scandinavia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Miner
Achievements.Description: Complete delivery jobs to all quarries in Scandinavia (requires Scandinavia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Aquaphobia
Achievements.Description: Travel across the Øresund Bridge between København and Malmö (requires Scandinavia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Bon Voyage!
Achievements.Description: Discover all French cities (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

Achievements.Title: Landmark Tour
Achievements.Description: Discover following landmarks of France: Carcassonne, Brotonne bridge, Tiger tank, Peyrat-le-Château, Château de Ventadour, Château d'Ussé (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

Achievements.Title: Go Nuclear!
Achievements.Description: Deliver cargo to five nuclear plants in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

Achievements.Title: Check-in, Check-out
Achievements.Description: Deliver cargo to all cargo airport terminals in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

Achievements.Title: Gas Must Flow!
Achievements.Description: Deliver diesel, lpg or petrol to all truck stops in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

Achievements.Title: Time for Big Hauling
Achievements.Description: Deliver first Heavy Cargo (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

Achievements.Title: Keep Calm and Haul Heavy
Achievements.Description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) of 3 consecutive Heavy Cargo Pack jobs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

Achievements.Title: You Bet I Can Park It!
Achievements.Description: Collect 1,000 XP from parking on Heavy Cargo Pack deliveries (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

Achievements.Title: No Pain No Gain
Achievements.Description: Deliver total of 250 tons of cargo on 5 consecutive jobs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

Achievements.Title: I Thought This Should Be Heavy?!
Achievements.Description: Complete a delivery of all heavy cargoes in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

Achievements.Title: Imperator
Achievements.Description: Discover all Italian cities (requires Italia DLC)

Achievements.Title: True Sicilian
Achievements.Description: Own a garage in every Sicilian city (requires Italia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Captain
Achievements.Description: Deliver cargo to all Italian shipyards (requires Italia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Mind the Lava
Achievements.Description: Visit Etna and Vesuvius volcanoes (requires Italia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Many Roads Lead to Rome
Achievements.Description: Enter Rome from all corridors that lead to it (requires Italia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Michelangelo
Achievements.Description: Complete a delivery from Carrara quarry (requires Italia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Size Matters
Achievements.Description: Deliver first oversize cargo (requires Special Transport DLC)

Achievements.Title: The Bigger the Better
Achievements.Description: Complete delivery of all oversize cargoes (requires Special Transport DLC)

Achievements.Title: Driver Exceptionnel
Achievements.Description: Complete deliveries on all oversize routes in current map (requires Special Transport DLC)

Achievements.Title: Not a Big Problem
Achievements.Description: Complete 3 consecutive oversize jobs without any damage (requires Special Transport DLC)

Achievements.Title: Giant
Achievements.Description: Complete delivery of the Silo cargo (requires Special Transport DLC)

Achievements.Title: Big Brother
Achievements.Description: Complete delivery of the Haul Truck Chassis (requires Special Transport DLC)

Achievements.Title: Not a Canoe
Achievements.Description: Complete delivery of the Service Boat (requires Special Transport DLC)

Achievements.Title: Mass-to-don
Achievements.Description: Deliver at least 195 tons of oversized cargo in just 3 consecutive deliveries (requires Special Transport DLC)

Achievements.Title: Baltic Tourist
Achievements.Description: Discover all Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC cities (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Grand Tour
Achievements.Description: Complete perfect deliveries (no damage, no fines, on time) between the following countries: Russia - Lithuania; Lithuania - Latvia; Latvia - Estonia; Estonia - Russia; Russia - Finland. Any order or direction counts (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Exclave Transit
Achievements.Description: Complete 5 deliveries from Kaliningrad to any other Russian city (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Concrete Jungle
Achievements.Description: Complete 10 deliveries from concrete plants (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Industry Standard
Achievements.Description: Make at least two deliveries to each locomotive, furniture and paper mill factories (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Like a Farmer
Achievements.Description: Deliver cargo to each farm in Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: All Around the Blue Island
Achievements.Description: Discover all Sardinian cities (requires Italia DLC)

Achievements.Title: All Around the Isle of Beauty
Achievements.Description: Discover all Corsican cities (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

Achievements.Title: Balkan Explorer
Achievements.Description: Discover all cities in Romania, Bulgaria and Turkey (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Ranger
Achievements.Description: Visit all border crossings between Romania, Bulgaria and Turkey (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Ferryman
Achievements.Description: Use a river ferry (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Taking the Scenic Route
Achievements.Description: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Turkish Delight
Achievements.Description: Complete 3 deliveries from Istanbul which are at least 2,500 km long (requires Road to the Black Sea and Going East DLCs)

Achievements.Title: Along the Black Sea
Achievements.Description: Complete perfect deliveries (no damage, no fines, on time) between these coastal cities: Istanbul-Burgas, Burgas-Varna, Varna-Mangalia, Mangalia-Constanța. Any order or direction counts (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

Achievements.Title: Orient Express
Achievements.Description: Complete deliveries between following cities, in this order and direction: Paris-Strasbourg, Strasbourg-Munich, Munich-Vienna, Vienna-Budapest, Budapest-Bucharest, Bucharest-Istanbul (requires Road to the Black Sea and Going East DLCs)

Achievements.Title: Conquistador
Achievements.Description: Discover every city in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Let's Get Shipping
Achievements.Description: Deliver cargo to all container ports in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Taste the Sun
Achievements.Description: Deliver ADR cargo to all solar power plants in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Fleet Builder
Achievements.Description: Deliver cargo to all shipyards in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Iberian Pilgrimage
Achievements.Description: Complete a delivery from Lisbon, Seville, and Pamplona to A Coruña (requires Iberia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Grand Tour Guide
Achievements.Description: View cutscenes from all viewpoints in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

Achievements.Title: Parking Challenge
Achievements.Description: Complete 20 deliveries choosing the trailer delivery option which requires reversing

Achievements.Title: Road to the Adriatics
Achievements.Description: Discover every city in West Balkans (requires West Balkans DLC)

Achievements.Title: Grand Adventurer
Achievements.Description: View cutscenes from all viewpoints in West Balkans (requires West Balkans DLC)

Achievements.Title: Through the Serpentines
Achievements.Description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, on time) between Pristina and Bijelo Polje (requires West Balkans DLC)

Achievements.Title: Holiday Coastline
Achievements.Description: Complete 3 deliveries along the coast in this order: Rijeka - Zadar - Split - Niksic (requires West Balkans DLC)

Achievements.Title: Going Camping
Achievements.Description: Deliver the following cargoes to complete a production chain in this order: Ore (Bauxite Terminal), Aluminium Ingots (Aluminium Factory), Electrical Wiring (Betunija Market), Electronics (Light Factory Eumefa), Campervans (Larus Car Factory) (requires West Balkans DLC)

Achievements.Title: Get the Ball Rollin'
Achievements.Description: Complete the first scenario of the first chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

Achievements.Title: Professional Driver
Achievements.Description: Complete at least 6 scenarios in the fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics while using only the interior camera (Driving Academy)

Achievements.Title: Dedicated Student
Achievements.Description: Complete at least 28 scenarios in Truck Driving Basics including the final exams (Driving Academy)

Achievements.Title: One-Shottin' It
Achievements.Description: Complete any scenario in fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics in one attempt without correcting by driving forward (Driving Academy)

Achievements.Title: Rowing Through the Gears
Achievements.Description: Complete 20 scenarios in chapters two, three or four of Truck Driving Basics using an H-shifter or sequential transmission (Driving Academy)

Achievements.Title: Failure Is Not an Option
Achievements.Description: Complete any 5 scenarios in a row without failure from the third or fourth chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

Achievements.Title: Sights and Legends
Achievements.Description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

Achievements.Title: All Inclusive
Achievements.Description: Deliver cargo to at least 4 unique hotels in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

Achievements.Title: Temple Worthy
Achievements.Description: Deliver 3 Marble Blocks and 3 undamaged Marble Slabs from Rock Eater Quarry in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

Achievements.Title: Gift of Athena
Achievements.Description: Deliver olives or olive oil from Eliarchos Olive Farm to 5 different cities in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

Achievements.Title: Odyssean Voyager
Achievements.Description: Discover at least 12 cities in Greece (requires Greece DLC)
